Control Name: INFORMATION SYSTEM BACKUP | TEST RESTORATION USING SAMPLING
Control Statement: The organization uses a sample of backup information in the restoration of selected information system functions as part of contingency plan testing.Supplemental Guidance:  Related control: CP-4.
